name: iShares Global Electric and Autonomous Vehicles Index ETF
longDescription: The ETF seeks to provide long-term capital growth. The ETF seeks to provide long-term capital growth by replicating, to the extent possible, the performance, net of expenses, of an index selected at the discretion of BlackRock, that is composed of companies that could benefit from the development and adoption of electric and autonomous vehicles. The current index for the ETF is the Morningstar Global Electric & Autonomous Vehicles Select Index.
fulldescription: The ETF seeks to provide long-term capital growth. The ETF seeks to provide long-term capital growth by replicating, to the extent possible, the performance, net of expenses, of an index selected at the discretion of BlackRock, that is composed of companies that could benefit from the development and adoption of electric and autonomous vehicles. fullAddress: BCE Place, 161 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, CA
